price: Efiri Nwoma (nyinaa) Maame (Lawhul- Mah’fuuz) a εwͻ Yεnkyεn no mu, (Nwoma a) yɛamaso paa, adwen ne nyansa ahyε mma.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
